name: Connection, Inc.
description: Connection, Inc. is a leading technology solutions provider based in the United States, specializing in delivering IT products and services to businesses, educational institutions, and government entities. Established in 1982, Connection has built a reputation for its comprehensive portfolio that includes hardware, software, and advanced technology solutions such as cloud computing, cybersecurity, and IT asset management. The company’s mission is to empower organizations to leverage technology effectively, enhancing productivity and operational efficiency. Connection serves a diverse client base, ranging from small businesses to large enterprises, offering tailored solutions to meet their unique needs. With a focus on customer service and technical support, Connection has developed long-standing relationships with numerous technology partners, including leading manufacturers like Dell, HP, and Microsoft. In recent years, Connection has emphasized its commitment to sustainability and responsible business practices, aligning its operations with environmental stewardship. As technology continues to evolve, Connection remains dedicated to staying at the forefront of innovation to provide clients with the best tools and strategies to succeed in a competitive landscape.
